attributes.additional_details: Force the NHS to change the policy on Gay men giving blood
attributes.background: Gay men are refused daily from Giving blood in the NHS because they are Gay and like the same sex. This needs to change. Where is equality?  #GayBloodSavesLives

rejection.details:
People aren't banned from giving blood because of their sexuality. If you'd like a specific change to the rules on giving blood for men who have sex with men, you could start a new petition asking for the change you'd like to see. 

You can see the current rules here:

https://www.blood.co.uk/who-can-give-blood/men-who-have-sex-with-men/

You can find out about some recent changes to the rules here:

https://www.blood.co.uk/news-and-campaigns/news-and-statements/blood-donation-rules-have-changed/
